name: BidmadAdapterDynamic
summary: BidmadAdapterFNC is an ad adapter with support for Facebook Audience Network, AdFit, Pangle, Fyber, and ADOP ads
description: BidmadAdapterFNC is an ad adapter with support for Facebook Audience Network, AdFit, Pangle, Fyber, and ADOP ads. Please setup BidmadSDK (4.1.0.0 or higher) first.
